newsitem.title: USA: Mercury Finance to sell unit to Frontier.
newsitem.headline: Mercury Finance to sell unit to Frontier.

text.p: Mercury Finance Co on Friday said it entered a definitive agreement to sell its Lyndon Insurance Group subsidiary to Frontier Insurance Group Inc for $92 million in cash.
The company said it hoped to satisfy non-regulatory conditions to the sale by early April and receive the regulatory approvals needed to close it by the end of April.
Representatives of Mercury's creditors have reviewed the agreement and expressed support for it, the company said..
Lyndon, headquartered in St. Louis, was acquired by Mercury in October 1995 for $72.5 million.
